medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a history of recurrent kidney stones since childhood. After moving to Finland, he experienced urinary sediment abnormalities classified as urates in 1999. He underwent several interventions for stone problems. In May 2009, he received a kidney transplant but exhibited low kidney function post-transplant, requiring dialysis again by 2010. Allograft dysfunction progressed, and he required a second transplant in September 2012.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Recurrent kidney stones since childhood; End-stage renal disease requiring dialysis.
medical_history.family_history: Grandfather had suffered from urinary stones; otherwise, family history negative.
